def birthdaycandles(cases):

	result = []
	while cases > 0:
	    candles = map(int, raw_input().split(" "))
	    minimum = min(candles[1:])
	    if minimum > candles[0]:
	        result.append('1'+('0'*(candles[0]+1))) 
	    else:
	        result.append(str(candles[1:].index(minimum)+1)*(minimum+1))
	    cases = cases - 1
	return result    
 
if __name__ == "__main__":

	cases = input()
	if cases <= 100 and cases >= 1:
		result = birthdaycandles(cases)
		for values in result:
			print values
